tag_list: credit, credit-report, credit-scores, financial-services, bank, credit-union, entrepreneur, midwest, wisconsin, ceo, software, saas, fiserv
overview:
Founder and CEO of Credit Coach, Inc

Previously from the mortgage lending industry, Andy started the first full scale for-profit consulting service to assist lenders and consumers with credit management.

In 2008, Andy switched gears and started Credit Coach, Inc a software company that innovates new ways to automate the credit management process for consumers while at the same time assisting banks and credit unions with maximizing their customer’s potential.
